summary: This document consists of email correspondence primarily between Jes Staley and Alexa N. Staley regarding a schedule of meetings with various professors at Columbia University. It highlights Alexa's interactions with academic figures and her plans for the day.

keyFacts: The document contains email correspondence between Jes Staley and his daughter, Alexa N. Staley.
Alexa N. Staley met with several professors at Columbia University on October 12, 2010.
The email discusses a schedule of meetings and includes names of professors and a graduate student.
There is mention of a lunch meeting with a person named Cookie Neil.
Jim McMenamin is noted as someone Alexa was supposed to meet but was not present at the scheduled time.
